Sample Insurance Policy Clauses
Clause 1: The policy covers hospitalization expenses up to I5,00,000 for individuals aged between
18-60 years.
Clause 2: Pre-existing diseases are covered only after a waiting period of 2 years from the date of
policy inception.
Clause 3: Any surgeries performed outside of India are not eligible for reimbursement.
Clause 4: Knee replacement surgery is covered if the policyholder has been continuously insured
for more than 1 year.
Clause 5: Claims must be submitted

re than 1 year.
Clause 5: Claims must be submitted within 30 days of discharge from the hospital.
Clause 6: Coverage is not available for injuries sustained during participation in extreme sports.
Clause 7: Policy does not cover dental treatments unless arising from an accident.
